text: Me ghua Gilgalɨn nguibamɨn boroghɨn, dagɨabar gumazir nedazibar ingarigha da asezir danganimɨn otifi. Egha danganir kamɨn, Ehut Moapian atrivimɨn ganasa a bagha uamatenge. An Atrivim Eklonɨn ganigha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Atrivim, kɨ nɨ mɨkɨmamin mɨgɨrɨgɨar mam iti, nɨ uabɨra a baragham.” Ezɨ atrivim kamaghɨn uan ingangarir gumazibav gei, “Ia mangɨ, ga uaningra ikiam.” Ezɨ ingangarir gumaziba bar moghɨra azenan ghue.
